name: src/core/Component.js
Component
description:
Base component class for one-way data binding
it's very similar to ReactJS component architecture,
but not supporting props and propTypes.
Use this documentation as reference {@link https://facebook.github.io/react/docs/component-specs.html}

name: setState
description: Use this method to update state of component

name: initialize
description:
Overwrite this method to initialize any logic operation
on your component

name: postInitialize
description: Build in function to make operations after initialization is over

name: render
description: Overwrite this method to make any DOM operations.

name: postRender
description: Build in function to apply operations after render is over

name: postUpdate
description: Last element of the component life cycle, mostly used by applyComponent method

name: onUpdate
description: Setter of postUpdate method

name: element
description: Element getter

name: applyComponent
description: Applying component into DOM body

params.name: qs
params.description: Query String, where we should inject component

Rest

Adds 'dragenter", "dragover", "dragleave" and "drop" events to L.Map
Can be enbled/disabled like all handlers.

name: src/handlers/selection/Map.BoxSelect.js
BoxSelect
description:
L.Handler.BoxSelect is used to add ctrl-drag select interaction to the map
(select markers/paths to a selected bounding box), enabled by default.

description: BoxSelect: event name changed *
